original_text: But after Uzziah became powerful, his pride led to his downfall. He was unfaithful to the Lord his God, and entered the temple of the Lord to burn incense on the altar of incense.
korean_text: 그가 강성하여지매 그의 마음이 교만하여 악을 행하여 그의 하나님 여호와께 범죄하되 곧 여호와의 성전에 들어가서 향단에 분향하려 한지라

sentences.original_text: his pride led to his downfall
He was unfaithful to the Lord his God
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 주 그의 하나님께 신실하지 않았으며

sentences.original_text: and entered the temple of the Lord
to burn incense on the altar of incense
